Package com.github.skopylov58.functional

Class Validation<T,E>

java.lang.Object
com.github.skopylov58.functional.Validation<T,E>
Type Parameters:
T - type to validate
E - type of validation error
public class Validation<T,E> extends Object
Simple functional validator collecting all validation errors.
